function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relatively high self-reported compliance with COVID-19 mitigation measures","Impact":"Potential for false sense of security and reduced vigilance","Mitigation":"Increase education and awareness about continued risk","Technologies":"Public health campaigns and information dissemination","People":"General population in the US","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Large reductions in retail and recreational activities, as well as in the usage of public transit, and visits to workplaces","Impact":"Economic impact and potential increase in social isolation","Mitigation":"Support for affected businesses and individuals, development of alternative modes of transportation, and promotion of safe social interaction","Technologies":"Remote work technology, virtual meeting platforms, and contactless delivery services","People":"Business owners, workers, and individuals reliant on public transit","Owner":"Government agencies, business associations, and community organizations"},{"Description":"People meeting with friends and relatives outside of their direct household","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to social gatherings","Mitigation":"Promote adherence to gathering size limits, use of outdoor spaces, and continued use of masks and physical distancing","Technologies":"Social distancing apps, communication tools for virtual socializing, and outdoor venue booking platforms","People":"General population in the US","Owner":"Individuals, community leaders, and event organizers"}]}
